definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: But, what is that larger mystical body?
sentences.chinese: 但这个更大的神秘主义主体是什么？

sentences.english: Nearly all Christian mystical writers relegate these phenomena to the periphery.
sentences.chinese: 几乎所有的基督教神秘主义作家贬谪这些现象的边缘。

sentences.english: It is ridiculous to represent him as a mystic in quest of total love.
sentences.chinese: 让他代表找寻整个爱情的神秘主义者是荒唐可笑的。

sentences.english: The Tradition of Logocentrism in Western Philosophy and the Revolution of Marxs Philosophy;
sentences.chinese: 另一个传到西方的传统是犹太神秘主义。

sentences.english: This is a genuinely religious feeling that has nothing to do with mysticism.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种真正虔诚的感觉，与神秘主义无关。

sentences.english: Mystics say that the Buddha returns now to help regenerate the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 神秘主义者声称佛陀会在这时回归，帮助地球重生。

sentences.english: His heart wasn't in the mystic side of freemasonry .
sentences.chinese: 他的内心不处在共济会的神秘主义方面。

sentences.english: Neither engineers nor mystics can stem the flow.
sentences.chinese: 工程师和神秘主义者都无法阻止它的流动。

sentences.english: There were obvious tendency of mysticism in Xu Yus aesthetic thinking and literary creation. I Kants and A.
sentences.chinese: 徐的美学思想及文学创作有着明显的神秘主义倾向。

sentences.english: The Western Humanistic Tradition, Neo-conservatism and the Bush Principle;
sentences.chinese: 另一个传到西方的传统是犹太神秘主义。

sentences.english: Scientists and mystics alike thrill to the idea of some great unknown.
sentences.chinese: 科学家与神秘主义者对未知的事物一样惊恐地发抖。

sentences.english: The Art of Memory was at the core of orthodox mystical methods.
sentences.chinese: 记忆的艺术在神秘主义的正统方法的核心。

sentences.english: There were obvious tendency of mysticism in Xu Yus aesthetic thinking and literary creation.
sentences.chinese: 徐的美学思想及文学创作有着明显的神秘主义倾向。

sentences.english: Because in many ways, this sounds like mysticism.
sentences.chinese: 因为在很多方面，这听上去像神秘主义。

sentences.english: All of the foundations for occultism and witchcraft are in place.
sentences.chinese: 所有神秘主义和巫术的根基都已立好。
他们会实践神秘主义吗？

definition: pantheism, theological theory equating God with the Universe
neo-Platonism (philosophical system combining Platonism with mysticism)
pinyin: xin1 Bo2 la1 tu2 zhu3 yi4

definition: agnosticism, the philosophical doctrine that some questions about the universe are in principle unanswerable
